hero.title: Stop Foot Traffic.
hero.subtitle: Break the boundaries of square footage. Offer limitless virtual experiences that boost brand retention and lead generation at every event.

toolkit.title: The Engagement Toolkit
toolkit.subtitle: Transform passive viewers into active participants.

features.title: Interactive Product Demos
features.desc: Let attendees "explode" products into 3D components, see them in action at full scale, or customize features in real-time. Engagement that sticks.

features.title: Virtual Booth Portals
features.desc: Transport users from a 10x10 physical space into a massive, custom-branded virtual world. Unlimited square footage, zero rental fees.

features.title: Multi-User Presentations
features.desc: Enable synchronized VR keynotes where dozens of attendees experience a presentation simultaneously. Scale your message without scaling your stage.

pillars.title: Maximum Retention
pillars.desc: Active participation ensures your brand is the most memorable part of the exhibition. Attendees don't just see your product—they experience it.

pillars.title: Data-Driven Leads
pillars.desc: Track what products attendees looked at most and for how long. Turn engagement metrics into qualified sales leads with precision analytics.

pillars.title: Storytelling Without Limits
pillars.desc: Showcase "unshippable" items like heavy machinery, real estate, or massive installations anywhere in the world. Physics is no longer a constraint.

items.title: Corporate Trade Shows
items.text: Break through the noise of a crowded exhibition hall. Capture high-quality lead data while competitors hand out brochures.

items.title: Cultural & Art Exhibitions
items.text: Transform static displays into interactive storytelling experiences. Museums and galleries can bring artifacts to life in ways physical exhibits never could.

items.title: Product Launches
items.text: Create viral-worthy social media moments that extend your launch beyond the event. Make your product the talk of the industry.

logistics.title: Turnkey Event Logistics.
logistics.subtitle: We provide the hardware, the booth setup, and the onsite technical support. You focus on your guests, not the cables.

items.title: Complete Hardware Package
items.desc: VR headsets, motion chairs, tracking systems, and display screens—all delivered and configured.

items.title: Professional Booth Setup
items.desc: Our team handles installation, calibration, and aesthetic integration with your brand identity.

items.title: Onsite Technical Support
items.desc: Dedicated technicians ensure seamless operation throughout your event. Zero downtime guaranteed.
